front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Test Procedures and Requirements for Alternating-Current Cable Terminations Used on Shielded Cables Having Laminated Insulation Rated 2.5 kV through 765 kV or Extruded Insulation Rated 2.5 kV through 500 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard provides test procedures and requirements for all indoor and outdoor cable terminations used on alternating-current shielded cables having laminated insulation rated 2.5 kV through 765 kV and extruded insulation rated 2.5 kV through 500 kV, except separable insulated connectors, which are covered by IEEE Std 386-2016 [B18]. Cable terminations and component parts shall be capable of withstanding the tests specified in this standard
